channel.title: How to make a drop model for your costum item?
channel.description: Hello, i want to add a costum item into my client but i also need a drop model for it, how do i make a drop model?

item.title: How to make a drop model for your costum item?
item.dc:creator: @burg355 burg355
item.description:
@burg355 wrote:

You Need To Make The Image On The Floor…

Example the wield model floats a bit above the grid on the item makin program

the drop model needs to be on the floor i.e how it looks when you have clicked dropp…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a drop model for your costum item?
